channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: One smash up blue audl, 9th February
item.description:
This morning outside of my local co op in Leighton road in bush Hill park Enfield En1 1xh is this blue audl and the reg GY11YZG is out of mot it expired on the 9 of February 2026 and it's all smashed up and looks like it has been dump out side of the co op store I think it has been abandoned by owner but not sure can you please check

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Leighton Road, Southbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extensive uneven paving, 9th February
item.description:
Between Sainsbury's & the road, there is very uneven paving that moves beneath you when walking. This extensive issue is dangerous for everyone, especially for elderly or disabled. Cars drive over to get to parking spaces and it just keeps getting worst. This issue has been ongoing for at least a year.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tilston Bright Square, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown bushes and trees, 9th February
item.description:
Behund St Nicholas road houses there is a lot of bushes and trees which are growing into some gardens. Can they be removed? We have no access from our own garden to remove it.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Nicholas Road, Plumstead

item.title: Crazy amounts of litter along Maiden Lane, 9th February
item.description:
I first reported this on 16th January but it hasn’t been picked up yet. The litter all along this stretch of Maiden Lane where the marshes are is horrendous. It’s getting to the point where I want to keep my curtains down all day so I don’t have to see it all!! Please please can you fix this issue. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maiden Lane, Barnes Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
